description: Try our easy to follow Passionfruit, Tofu & Ginger Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Passionfruit, Tofu & Ginger Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven and place on a wire rack to cool completely. Cover and place in refrigerator to chill overnight. Drizzle with passionfruit and serve.
